name: Pot Wash Panic (Wild Duck Games)
description:
Pot Wash Panic

Play as the Bot-Wash, created by a scientist to clean plates. Don’t too break many! The kitchen is full of obstacles that could make you drop your plates. You need to be quick! If too many plates come in, they’ll all break!

Gameplay

Race against the clock to clean as many plates as possible. Don't touch the Chef or he'll throw you back, smashing all your plates! Speed through Quick time events to clean each plate but be careful not to get it wrong. Smash too many and its GAME OVER!

Credits
